description:
Jonouchi swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Haga let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes!  Will Haga’s royal ravager swarm Jonouchi into submission?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鋼鉄[はがね]の騎士ギアフリード
